concept.title: Step 2. Back Up the Environment Configuration File
concept.shortdesc: Before you install the new version, create a backup of the environment configuration file, $SDC_DIST/libexec/sdcd-env.sh, so that the file is not overwritten when you install the new version.

conbody.p: For example, if you are upgrading version 1.4.0.0, you might create a backup by renaming the file as follows: sdcd-env-1400.sh.
